file_content.text: Another Voss delivered for judgment? Rejoice!
You fight as Gormak fight, not with vile magics. You are not Voss.
I will come for you.
Find the doubters, destroy them.
It is deep in the Nightmare Lands, shrouded in madness. None can walk there.
The doubters believe their shamans can protect them from the taint, but they are wrong. They will be corrupted, as will you.
I know how to handle the Nightmare Lands.
No, I won't.
A little more tarnish on my soul won't make much difference.
I'm as dirty as they come.
You have taken my worth and my sons.
That's all I need. [Kill him]
The Sith know how to deal with your corruption.
No, I won't.
Your superstitious hogwash ain't gonna scare me.
Eh, I'm not worried.
I will hope you survive, that I might purge your corruption when my strength returns.
That's all I need. [Kill him]
Better than dead.
How are the shamans supposed to protect them?
What's their secret?
They make medicines and believe this protects their weak minds. No medicine will help them. Voss corruption is unnatural, only Voss thrive on it.
I've been some pretty nasty places and managed well enough.
I've heard that story before.
You are not easily stopped. You may be like the other.
I have seen a Voss from the stars who is fearless of the Nightmare Lands. Corrupt he must be, but mad he is not.
I'd suggest you think of a solution real fast.
Start helping, or else.
There is no solution! A Gormak has no reason to tread there--
Wait--I have seen a Voss from the stars who is fearless of the Nightmare Lands. Corrupt he must be, but mad he is not.
Take his secrets, I have none to give.
I can work with that. You get to live.
You've given enough.
You will regret this.
Glad you saw things my way.
I am disgraced. My sons are dead.
When I find my strength, I will kill you.
I plan on it. [Kill him]
The doubters believe their shaman's medicines can protect them from the taint, but they are wrong. They will be corrupted, as will you.
I've already taken precautions against the taint.
I'm protected.
The only protection from the corruption is to destroy it.
It's not impossible to travel there, I should know.
I've been there before.
There is no reason for a Gormak to travel those lands.
That really isn't your problem, now is it?
I didn't ask for your opinion.
No.
Go, warrior. Our trade is complete. We will meet again on the field of battle.
The Sith know how to deal with the corruption.
I'm taking care of it.
The only way to deal with the corruption is extinction of the Voss.
I've met someone who can walk the Nightmare Lands.
Not everyone gets corrupted.
The Voss from the stars. We have seen who you speak of.
Keep your opinions to yourself.
We're done here.
Our trade is complete. Go, we will meet again on the field of battle.
I'm willing to take that risk.
I have to follow them.
I'll try not to lose my head.
Thanks for the warning.
I'm willing to try their medicines if there's a chance it'll work.
I don't have another option.
True Gormak do not travel those lands. We do not make such medicines.
Your king managed well enough.
Jokull did it, I can too.
You are not Jokull.
We have seen a Voss from the stars who is fearless of the Nightmare Lands.
Corrupt he must be, but mad he is not. Seek him and learn his secrets if you must.
The woman convinced the weak to doubt Jokull's vision; they follow her to the Dark Heart.
Enough! We misjudge this one. Throw down the barriers!
Why does one who fights pure come to rescue the corrupted?
You aren't the only ones who want to see her punished.
I didn't come to rescue her.
It is good to know others are not all Voss.
Tell me where she is before I blow your head off.
Talk now or else.
We do not wish to fight a warrior of your strength. We wish to learn.
Why does one who is not impure trespass on our land and shed our blood?
I'm hunting the woman you took.
You have someone I want.
The blasphemer.
To be fair, you were the ones who shot first.
I wasn't looking for a fight.
We must be vigilant. Voss are deceivers. They send Voss who do not look like Voss to kill and corrupt.
Gormak captured such a Voss. She came with words instead of weapons.
What's with all this pure, impure business?
Corrupted?
Voss twist our land with their waking dreams. Voss must be destroyed, and we have almost crushed them.
Desperate, they sent their deceiver to convince us to share their corruption.
Most would not listen to her lies, but there are those who doubt the truth. They stole her before she was judged.
Wise Jokull would not listen to her lies, but her words found the weak. Doubters stole her before she was judged.
Tell me where to find these doubters; I'll make sure she gets what's coming to her.
Then I'll just steal her back.
We've got common interests; we should work together.
Help me find her.
The woman's got a knack for getting people to see things her way.
Of course they did.
We may have found your match.
She's your type, Gault.
Ahh, she's a one-trick thranta.
Besides, human's a little mundane for my taste.
Besides, you humans don't age so gracefully... no offense.
You know where they took her?
You possess things we want; we possess things you want. A trade. Knowledge for knowledge.
Ooh, boss! Blizz make lots of trades! Get good deal! Boss let Blizz trade with Gormak?
What are you proposing?
I'll handle this myself.
I'm not big on haggling anyway.
Okay, sure.
Blizz not disappoint boss!
Boss! Boss, look! Gormak tech so shiny! Blizz can't wait to make improvements!
Blizz. Did they tell you about our target, or not?
What about General Redrish?
Oops... sorry, boss. Blizz forget to ask.
You can open your presents once we've dealt with General Redrish, okay?
Got a few new toys, huh?
Aww... okay.
You better be holding the answer to my question.
I didn't tell you to shop.
Umm... remind Blizz of question.
Your little maker's machines show us much. We repay his ingenuity.
The last thing I need is you trading my kit for a new can opener.
Butt out.
Blizz have things for trade, not need boss's things... have good can opener.
What're we talkin' for? Brain 'em.
Better late than never.
We see your machine has a mind. Our machines do not possess this trait. I will trade for it. Our science for yours.
If your offer's good, I'll let you have a peek at his insides.
You can look, but that's all.
This droid's one of a kind; I'm not just gonna give him away.
He's irreplaceable.
If you will not part with it, I will trade for knowledge of its workings.
I'll pass.
We will offer you the weapons, armor and materials of Gormak. Unique, by my design. This, and knowledge of the blasphemer.
Sounds good.
You have taught us much today.
How about you give me everything I want, and I let you live?
I don't trade. I take.
You mean the weapons and armor that didn't stop me? Come on, get serious.
You can do better than that.
I add to this offer, my prized treasure. Nothing greater I can give.
Show us to fight as you fight. I will tell where the invader woman went.
I'll show you the ropes if it gets me out without trouble.
I suppose that's fair.
Oh, I'll show you how I fight all right.
I'd rather beat it out of you.
Gonna be the lesson of your lives.
A Voss after all. Crush her!
A Voss after all. Crush him!
I don't come that cheap.
Sweeten the deal.
We shall trade you wealth and knowledge, then. Give the warrior weapons that are worthy.
That's better.
Observe this warrior well, my sons.
We see, you are whole. Weapon and body as one.
The less you have to think before you act, the better.
That's the gist of it.
We will build to account for this.
Got the hang of this pretty quickly. Shame I can't stick around.
You make good pupils.
What you have shown will make me strong. I will make Gormak strong, and I will be our new king.
What you have shown will make us the strongest. Jokull will honor us with great status.
Nice drills. You're a natural.
If you're done gawking, I want my information.
Whatever, school's out.
The doubters allowed the woman to lure them into the Nightmare Lands. They seek the Dark Heart.
The doubters question Jokull's vision; they were swayed to follow the blasphemer into the Nightmare Lands. They seek the Dark Heart.
The Nightmare Lands twist those that enter with the taint of the Voss; gives them waking nightmares until that is all they see.
Oh, hi! Hi! Gormak cheer for boss and Blizz?
Smile for the fans.
Lotta dyin' done here.
Thought I heard commotion.
Oh boy... I don't think we're the crowd favorite.
We will not be robbed of retribution again!
Great king Jokull is kind! We will see Voss bleed here today after all!
Interloper! The blood of Gormak stains you and corruption follows in your wake! For this, you shall be punished!
Hand over the outsider you captured, and nobody else has to get hurt.
I want the woman you took.
You come to rescue the blasphemer come to corrupt us?
You come to rescue the Voss woman great king Jokull gave us to punish. Ha!
Doubters robbed us of seeing her suffer, but you will not share her fortune.
Step up and try it. See what happens.
That supposed to be a threat?
Do you hear? This one wants a fight! You have killed many today. We will enjoy making sport of you.
You've got three seconds to drop these force fields.
Let me out of here or you die.
This we shall do! The land hungers and it must be fed.
Doubters have robbed us of the Voss woman, but you will not share her fortune.
We shall enjoy watching you struggle!
You shall make a more fitting tribute to Jokull than the blasphemer!
She is like nothing I have seen! Throw open the cages! Let her kill until nothing remains!
He is like nothing I have seen! Throw open the cages! Let him kill until nothing remains!
More! More war beasts! Let us see what it takes to drag this Voss down!
Let the beasts eat their fill!
It's called a droid, and it's yours if the price is right.
Okay, I'll trade.
I don't know, I'm kind of attached to it....
Not sure I want to give it up.
You share a bond much like our war beasts?
